primary.$description: Primary text color. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

muted.$description: Muted text color for secondary content. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

subtle.$description: Subtle text color for tertiary content. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

inverse.$description: Inverse text color for use on dark backgrounds. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

disabled.$description: Disabled text color for inactive elements. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.
